renderpass.code:
// variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/cl33WM

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = ( u+u - R ) / R.y,                // normalized coordinates
          V = abs( U + vec2(-U.y,U) )*.707,     // 45Â°-tilted + symmetry ( for cross )
          A = abs( U ); A.x -= .707;            // symmetries ( for loops )
    float l = length(A), x = A.x/l,
          s = cos(140.*( x > -.7 ? l-.5 : V.y < .2 ? V.y : V.x )); // for strips
          
    O =  clamp(R.yyyy/3. 
               * (.2 - abs( x > -.7             // .2- : thickness
                            ? l - .5            // loops SDF
                            : min(V.x,V.y)      // cross SDF
                        ) ) ,0.,1.)
                  *  ( .5+ .5*s/fwidth(s));     // AA strips
}
renderpass.name: Image
